import React, { Component } from 'react' import {Link, Redirect, Route, Switch} from 'react-router-dom' import all_teachers from './all_teachers/index' import all_students from './all_students/index' import all_parent from './all_parent/index' import axios from 'axios' import './index.css' export default class info_class extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { classDetail: '' } } componentDidMount() { axios.get('http://localhost:3000/classes') .then( (response) => { var {id} = this.props.match.params var classDetail = response.data.find((c) => c.id === id)//返回第一个结果为true this.setState({classDetail}) console.log(this.state.classDetail); }) } render () { return(
我的班级
返回上一级
折纸兴趣班
  • 所有老师( {this.state.classDetail.teacher} )
  • 所有学生( {this.state.classDetail.student} )
  • 所有家长( {this.state.classDetail.parent} )
{ }
) } }
